app.title: Echoes - Quotes From Around The World
app.description: Discover inspiring quotes from around the world

api.title: API Features
api.subtitle: Easily integrate quotes into your application with Echoes' powerful API

404.title: 404 - Page Not Found
404.heading: Page not found
404.description: The page you're looking for may have been moved, deleted, or never existed.

home.echoesDescription: A modern platform that brings together the most inspiring quotes from various sources.
home.sampleQuote: The truest guide in life is science.

docs.title: API Usage
docs.subtitle: Integrate quotes into your application with the Echoes API
docs.getAllQuotesDescription: Get all quote data from the system
docs.getRandomQuoteDescription: Display a different quote each time
docs.getRandomQuoteByLangDescription: Get random quotes filtered by specific language
docs.getRandomQuoteByAuthorDescription: Get random quotes from a specific author
docs.getRandomQuoteByAuthorAndLang: Get random quote by author and language
docs.getRandomQuoteByAuthorAndLangDescription: Get random quotes from a specific author(s) and language(s)
docs.baseUrlDescription: Start all your API requests with this base URL
docs.endpointsDescription: All API endpoints you can use to interact with quotes
docs.fetchRandomQuoteByAuthor: Fetch a random quote by author
docs.fetchRandomQuoteByMultipleAuthors: Fetch a random quote by multiple authors
docs.fetchRandomQuoteByMultipleLanguages: Fetch a random quote by multiple languages
docs.fetchRandomQuoteByMultipleAuthorsAndLang: Fetch a random quote by multiple authors and languages
docs.langParamDescription: Filter by language (e.g. "en", "tr") or multiple languages separated by commas (e.g. "en,tr")
docs.authorParamDescription: Filter by author name (case insensitive, partial match) or multiple authors separated by commas (e.g. "Einstein,Gandhi")

about.title: About Echoes
about.description: A collection of inspiring quotes from around the world
about.purposeText: Echoes is a project built to showcase quotes from various authors around the world in different languages. The project aims to provide inspiration and wisdom to users.
about.feature1Description: Multilingual database that offers quotes in multiple languages including English and Turkish.
about.feature2Description: View new inspiring quotes with a single click, refresh whenever you want.
about.feature3: Filter quotes by author or language
about.feature3Description: You can filter quotes by author or language to find exactly what you're looking for.
about.feature4Description: Open API for developers to integrate quotes into their own applications.
about.technologySubtitle: This project is built using the latest and best web technologies
about.technologyText: This project is built with Next.js, TypeScript, Tailwind CSS, and more modern web technologies.
about.echoesInfo: Echoes is a modern platform that allows you to easily discover inspiring quotes from around the world. It is designed for anyone seeking wisdom and insight.

language.notSupported: This language is not supported yet
